dt-option.name: language.searchBuilder.title
dt-option.summary: Set the message to be displayed in the SearchBuilder Title

type.description: `-init language.searchBuilder.title` changes what will be displayed in the text of the SearchBuilder title.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init language.searchBuilder.title` parameter is `'SearchBuilder'`.
dt-option.description:
As standard, SearchBuilder will set the SearchBuilder title to display a default text, in this case `'SearchBuilder'`.
The value of `-init language.searchBuilder.title` is passed into an `-api i18n()` function.
